attributes.action: Allow the people of Scotland a free vote on Scotlands Constitutional future, without hinderance or exemption
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This Petition is designed to bring to the attention of the Prime Minister the right of the Scottish population to have a free vote on their constitutional future.

It is the purpose of thisd petition to encourgae the prime minsiter to first of all recognise this, and secondly press for a free and open vote to the people of Scotland on the constitution of Scotland. This vote should not exclude any options, and should present all feasibly options to the people. 

This petition is therefore raised to ensure the voice of the people of Scotland is heard in all aspects of this important matter - The constituional future of the country and right of the people of Scotland to vote on the future of their prosperous nation.
